content.processed:
The Ministry of Interior commits to making their website https://covid.gov.cz accessible in accordance with law 99/2019 Sb., on the accessibility of websites and mobile applications, as amended, which is performed by Directives of the European Parliament and the council (EU) 2016/2102 from October 26th 2016.

This accessibility statement applies to the website https://covid.gov.cz

Compliance status

This website is consistent with law 99/2019 Sb., on the accessibility of websites and mobile applications.

Preparation of this accessibility statement

The accessibility statement was drawn up on November 5th 2020.
When developing this statement, the Ministry of Interior used the method of self-assessment.

Feedback and contact details

We are still working on this website being accessible to all without any complications. If you encounter any problems, please let us know. To communicate ideas, thoughts or comments, useful information or problems with the website please let us know via email - info@nakit.cz

Law enforcement procedures

In the event of an unsatisfactory response to a notification or request sent in accordance with Article 7 paragraph 1 b) the directive on the accessibility of websites and mobile applications, contact the law relevant law enforcement authority:

Ministry of the Interior of the Czech republic
Department of eGovernment
Náměstí Hrdinů 1634/3
Praha 4, 140 21

email: posta@mvcr.cz

page.title: Accessibility Statement
page.meta_description: This website is consistent with law 99/2019 Sb., on the accessibility of websites and mobile applications.
